author: Quinton Ashley
description: This is the core of Qodemate that can be easily updated without users having to reinstall the Qodemate native elctron app!
name: qodemate-core

scripts.up-outdated: npm install --save $(npm outdated | cut -d ' ' -f -1 | sed '1d' | sed 's/$/@*/')
scripts.postversion: git remote | xargs -L1 git push --all && git push --tags && npm publish
